title: Research and Markets: 2015 Australasian Oil and Gas Pipeline, Plant & Offshore Subscription
text:
Print 
DUBLIN--(BUSINESSWIRE)-- Research and Markets ( http://www.researchandmarkets.com/research/djvdq4/pipeline_plant ) has announced the addition of the "Pipeline, Plant & Offshore Subscription" newsletter to their offering. 
Pipeline, Plant & Offshore (PPO) is a concentrated Australasian oil and gas focused news publication, offering a number of print and digital formats to help keep you up to date. 
PPO covers: 
- Pipelines: gas, oil, slurry and large water pipelines 
- CSG: exploration and field development - Gas plants: power stations, LNG, industrial plants using gas as a feedstock 
- Offshore oil and gas developments 
- Tender announcements 
- Policy updates 
PPO comprises: 
- PPO Latest - your daily dose of news from around the industry sent direct to your inbox (along with a fully searchable online archive) 
- PPO Projects - a monthly update on all proposed and under construction oil and gas and pipeline industry projects in the Australasian region, available in hardcopy, digital magazine and pdf 
- The PPO online project database - containing completed, proposed and under construction projects (over 1,000 projects are listed) 
- PPO Annual - a compendium of all key Australasian proposed, under construction and commissioned pipeline, oil and gas and LNG projects 
Why subscribe? 
- Stay informed with all the last pipeline, plant and offshore news 
- Easy to find information in one location 
- Access to online database containing over 1,000 projects 
- Reduced staff time in collating information for business development 
Countries covered are:
